pinned_message.title: Welcome to Announcements
pinned_message.content: This space is for updates on our latest releases, major product changes, and company news. For discussions, please visit the relevant threads or contact support for questions.

pinned_message.title: Welcome to Technical Support
pinned_message.content: Get help with any technical issues you encounter with our product. Provide details to help our team assist you more effectively. For urgent issues, contact support directly.

pinned_message.title: Welcome to Shape Up Cycles
pinned_message.content: Follow our latest development cycles here, share feedback, and ask questions to help us improve the product. Join the conversation and stay updated on product development!

pinned_message.title: Collaborate with Us on New Features
pinned_message.content: This space is for collaboration on feature ideas. Share your workflows, use cases, and needs. Letâ€™s build something great together!

pinned_message.title: General Discussion
pinned_message.content: Broader discussions among community members on topics not specific to other categories. Enjoy connecting with others here!

pinned_message.title: Welcome to the Meta Category
pinned_message.content: This section is dedicated to discussions, updates, and information specifically for the maintenance and administration of this Discourse server. Please use this space only for topics related to server maintenance.
